## Funktional CSS

[Principles](docs/design.md)  
[Basic Example](http://filipelinhares.github.io/funkcss/)  
Docs - (comming soon)

## Development

```
npm install
gulp watch
```
**Other gulp comands**

- `gulp postcss` - compile lib to dist
- `gulp min` - minify dist
- `gulp` - both together
